description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Awesome 2D ninja platforming action! Play as the Katana Kid and fight to save Katana Land from devious ninja's, hordes of the undead and demon bosses. Along the way help an old guy out, rescue your allies and save a princess from the fate of becoming a demon bride!!!
description.short: Awesome 2D ninja platforming action! Play as the Katana Kid and fight to save Katana Land from devious ninja's, hordes of the undead and demon bosses. Along the way help an old guy out, rescue your allies and save a princess from the fate of becoming a demon bride!!!
